title: Update a Customer's Billing Address
description: A customer calls to inform the company that they have moved and need to update their billing address.

tasks.description: Identify the customer in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct customer account.

tasks.description: Authenticate the caller's identity to ensure they are authorized to make changes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the caller's identity by asking security questions.

tasks.description: Update the billing address in the customer master record.
